programmes.show_description: Gary Cunningham was trying to make a relationship work. But behind closed doors, he was being abused. S2, Ep8
The cry for help comes from Oklahoma City's most exclusive neighbourhood. 'My wife's bleeding all over the place' Dr. John Baxter Hamilton tells the 911 operator. S2, Ep2
Larry Mallory notices something unusual on his way to work. Lying in the middle of the highway is a human leg which has been severed from a human body with surgical precision. S2, Ep3
A millionaire boards a commercial flight in New York City and disappears into thin air. Authorities believe his former business associate is the man behind the disappearance. S2, Ep5
After a man notices bruises on his son's body, he files for a protective order and sues the mother of his child for legal fees. S22, Ep6
A man is suspended without pay after an ex-lover allegedly calls his boss; he sues for defamation of character. S22, Ep7
A beloved pet suffers a chest laceration after allegedly being attacked by another dog while on a walk. S22, Ep8
A teenager having trouble at home is accused of stealing his sister-in-law's wedding ring and pawning it. S22, Ep9
The Judge accuses a mother of covering for her mace-wielding teenager who sprayed a woman in the face at a hair salon. S22, Ep10
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
After fighting over bad checks and missing money, an argument between ex-lovers escalates to 'unique' car vandalism. S22, Ep11
A landscaper is accused of trying to scam an airplane owner out of his plane; he is sued for damages. S22, Ep12
father and daughter team up on a step-mother to sue for an unpaid loan and for an allegedly false restraining order. S22, Ep13
CPS gets involved to remove children from a drug-involved household; a father is sued for claiming his children as dependents. S22, Ep14
An artist claims a yogurt shop owner assaulted her and painted over a mural she spent over 200 hours on. S22, Ep15
A man with six children and three rescued pit bulls admits he didn't witness the alleged attack of a neighbours' dog S18, Ep204
A mysterious rent check, vanishing appliances and cat allergies come into play when ex-friends fight over an allegedly illegal eviction. S18, Ep205
A married couple sue their daughter's boyfriend for allegedly losing their dog and stealing their belongings while he was house sitting. S24, Ep151
When a man's ex-girlfriend accuses him of pulling a gun on her, he files a protective order and sues for a false arrest. S24, Ep152
The Judge orders a woman to hand over her dog to its co-parent in a contentious custody fight involving dead puppies and alleged emergency neutering. S24, Ep153
An RV owner is accused of messing up the festival camp vibe by refusing to pay for his girlfriend's camping fees. S24, Ep154
A man accuses a costume designer of delivering a shoddy product; the designer sues for slander and claims he received death threats. S24, Ep155
An impatient mother causes her son to be arrested and spend nine days in jail when she reports his work vehicle as stolen. S24, Ep156
A woman in search of a rose-themed tattoo claims she sustained an injury and infection at a tattoo parlour and sues for damages. S24, Ep157
Judge Judy refuses to accept a young man's rehearsed answer after he is accused of stealing a friend's motorcycle and wrecking it. S24, Ep158
An unsuspecting, older couple get the shock of their lives when they are pulled over by police for driving an allegedly stolen vehicle. S24, Ep159
A man comes at his friend with a pipe after his motorcycle is allegedly slammed to the ground; his friend returns the violence with a knife. S24, Ep160
A thrift store owner claims her business partners posted nasty signage and blocked customer flow; she denies that she unlawfully evicted them. S18, Ep206
After undergoing a kidney transplant, a man is sued by his mother for living expenses. Their bitter feud ends with a conciliatory hug. S18, Ep207
Feuding cousins, fighting over the title and unpaid balance on a car, are schooled on what constitutes a verbal contract. S18, Ep208
23-year-old Karyn Slover, who recently got her big break, leaves her desk at a local newspaper at 5pm and is never heard from again. S2, Ep6
In one violent evening, a series of bombs rock the sleepy California city of Fremont. The targets include both the Chief and Ex-Chief of police. S3, Ep1
When Thomas Ku vanishes, police scramble to find him. Time begins to run out on the diabetic man who is in desperate need of his medication. S3, Ep2
Kylie Dembrey from Berkshire fell for Mark Sinclair, unaware his charm hid a violent abuser. She kept the years of abuse secret, until he tragically murdered her. S3, Ep5
In 2023, 14-year-old Nathaniel Shani was fatally stabbed in Manchester. SIO Gina Brennand finds his killers in the form of two boys, just teenagers themselves. S2, Ep8
...Accident? The case of Leslie Neulander, who died at home in the arms of her husband Dr Robert Neulander, following a 911 call by their daughter, Jenna. S1, Ep8
Explore how Anna Young and her husband founded the House of Prayer. S1, Ep3

A small business owner claims her marketing manager did not deliver what he promised; she accuses him of tampering with her negative online review. S21, Ep241
A man's access to car auctions gets him in trouble with an old friend when a car deal falls apart. S21, Ep242
A woman sues her son for unpaid rent and damages to a home she rented to him. S21, Ep243
Trailer park owners sue a former tenant for spreading alleged lies that bedbugs were running rampant on their property. S21, Ep244
A woman accuses her caregiver of running a pet sitting business on the side; the caregiver claims the senior committed extortion. S24, Ep145
A woman, her husband and her three children move in with her sister, live for free and then sue her for unpaid credit card charges. S24, Ep146
After two years of living on the streets, a man claims his new 'garage home' was upended with an allegedly false restraining order and illegal eviction. S24, Ep147
After meeting online, two women end up fighting over missing business property, a shared car and the 'gift' of an iPhone. S24, Ep148
After smelling marijuana, a landlord confronts her tenants and tells them to move out; a teen insists that he has a license to imbibe because of chronic shoulder pain. S18, Ep209
A woman demands that the father of her new-born daughter pay for shared credit card debt and the cost of a new car motor. S18, Ep210
A landlord presents a long list of property damage that he insists his ex-tenant should pay for; she brings her own list of security deposit grievances. S18, Ep211
A married couple is sued by a daycare provider for unpaid childcare fees for their two children. S22, Ep16
Strong words are used when a woman is sued by a former friend for an unpaid loan and missing property. S22, Ep17
Custody exchange drama escalates when a woman confronts her estranged husband about scratches on their child. S22, Ep18
An 18-year-old sues the father of her child for return of her belongings and for filing allegedly false CPS reports. S22, Ep19
A mother of two allegedly suffers a broken nose at the hands of her sister-in-law during a heated fight. S22, Ep20
A man claims he was provoked by his landlord to retaliate online after she allegedly slandered a Nigerian immigrant. S22, Ep21
A young couple with a child saves 3K for their first apartment but claim it was dreadful; they are accused of smoking pot. S22, Ep22
A mother of two is accused of stealing her uncle's furniture after their lease-to-own agreement falls apart; she claims he took the furniture himself. S24, Ep161
A man insists that a young boy looks and acts just like him but his ex-lover says it's impossible and sues him for filing for a paternity test. S24, Ep162
A man and woman continue to live with each other 18 years after their divorce; when they finally part, the woman wants everything they shared. S24, Ep163
When a young car salesman disrespects the Judge, she advises that he take his parents out to a long lunch when the show airs. S24, Ep164
In the UK, Evie Adams seeks a loving family but finds a man with a deadly secret. Their hidden relationship unravels her dreams and leads to tragedy. S1, Ep2
When Anthony Ashley-Cooper disappeared in 2005, his family feared that he had been kidnapped, but evidence confirmed that he had been murdered for his money. S1, Ep1
Miriam Illes is found dead in her home, and oversized shoe prints in the deep snow lead Pennsylvania State Police to think they're dealing with an expert shooter. S3, Ep1
At 15, James Fairweather, obsessed with murder, turned fantasies into reality. He killed two random strangers in Colchester before police stopped his terrifying spree. S3, Ep6
Detectives take on the unsolved murder of Sharon Hammack. S5, Ep1
